titleStmt.title: The Nightingaless song, or, The Souldiers rare musick, and maids recreation this song adviseth maidens to have a care, and of souldiers snap-s[a]cks to beware : the tune is, No, no, no, not I, or, Pegg and the souldier.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: torn with loss of text; imprint lacking. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
